text: As they became known the Choir went to working-men's clubs, to Conisborough or cheap trips to sing to the miners, and sang for other organisations such as the Bakers Union, for whom they went on Saturday evenings to the Corner Pin Hotel, to rally the Sunday school was held.
handwritten_text: As they became known the Choir went to working-men's clubs, to Conisborough or cheap trips to sing to the miners, and sang for other organisations such as the Bakers Union, for whom they went on Saturday evenings to the Corner Pin Hotel, to rally the Sunday school was held.
